arts.ttl: Allegri previews ‘great’ Juve-Milan clash and discusses XI doubts: “Bartesaghi or Athekame”
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller On the eve of the clash between AC Milan and Juventus, Massimiliano Allegri spoke to the media at the usual press conference. Milan are currently flying high after four consecutive wins, beating Napoli last time out, but a tough clash is now on the cards for the Rossoneri: Juve away from home. Indeed, a win […] The post Allegri previews ‘great’ Juve-Milan clash and discusses XI doubts: “Bartesaghi or Athekame” appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Del Piero boosts Milan title hopes and reveals Yildiz’s target at Juventus

arts.ttl: QS: Pulisic, the key player for Milan vs Juventus
arts.sum: The Italian newspaper Il Quotidiano Sportivo, in this morning's print edition, ran the following headline in view of tomorrow's Serie A top fixture between Juventus and AC Milan at the Allianz stadium: "Pulisic, the star of the attack: against Juventus, he is the key player." Tomorrow evening, in the big match against the Bianconeri, the […]

arts.ttl: GdS: Allegri insists on Gimenez for Juve vs. Milan – character plays key role
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri has decided to rely on Santiago Gimenez in the No.9 role against Juventus, as highlighted by a report, and the Mexican remains eager to prove himself. It has been a tough start to the season for Gimenez, with just one goal in seven appearances (which also came in the big Coppa Italia win […] The post GdS: Allegri insists on Gimenez for Juve vs. Milan – character plays key role appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Milan boss Allegri eyes the usual defensive line in match vs Juventus
arts.sum: The tests Fikayo Tomori underwent after the muscle issue suffered last Sunday against Napoli fortunately showed only a slight adductor strain, which the defender recovered from in a few days. Yesterday, the English player returned to group training and will therefore be fully available to Massimiliano Allegri for tomorrow night’s trip to Juventus. Milan with […]

arts.ttl: Allegri continues to trust Santiago Gimenez ahead of Juventus match
arts.sum: It will be up to him again. Santiago Gimenez, the Mexican striker, who in this 2025-26 season with Milan is still goalless in Serie A. The former Feyenoord player has only scored once, in the Coppa Italia round of 32 against Lecce, despite being a starter since Leao’s injury on August 17 against Bari. One […]
